author: Huawei
description:
Is your data center ready for AI?

The biggest shift isn't just faster performance. It's a complete architectural reset.

At #HUAWEICONNECT EUROPE 2025, industry expert Philippe Nicolas and #Huawei's Yuan Yuan explain why the move to an #AllFlash data center is becoming inevitable for unifying data, boosting efficiency, and preparing for the AI era. 

In this #TransformTalks interview, they explore how all-flash architecture strengthens resilience, accelerates data access, and creates a stable foundation for next-generation intelligence.

Watch now! https://bit.ly/48Prthr #ThisIsHuawei #HuaweiStorage
title: Why All-Flash Data Centers Are Now Unstoppable
